official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for activities under the Federal Fire Prevention and Control Act of 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1984 and 1985 to carry out provisions of the Federal Fire Prevention and Control Act of 1974 (other than the payment of claims for the costs of firefighting on Federal property).

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for activities under the Federal Fire Prevention and Control Act of 1974, and for other purposes.
